mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservations(agent_id, product_id, user_id, visit_date, message, status, deposit_amount, user_payment_key) VALUES(#{agentId}, #{productId}, #{userId}, #{visitDate}, #{message}, #{status}, #{depositAmount}, #{userPaymentKey})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE status = 'PENDING' AND created_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 HOUR)
SELECT * FROM reservations WHERE status = 'REPORTED' AND reported_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 10 MINUTE)

SELECT p.trade_type, CONCAT(p.sgg_nm, ' ', p.umd_nm, ' ', p.jibun) AS address, p.name, p.floor, p.exclu_use_ar, p.desc, r.visit_date, r.status, p.deal_amount, p.deposit, p.monthly_rent FROM reservations r JOIN products p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId}
